#summary Module "binary"

= Binary module =

Defined in files `binary.js` and `binary.so`/`binary.dll`/`binary.dylib`.

== Binary/B ==

This module aims to implement CommonJS Binary/B specification. So far, the following is *NOT* done yet:

  * calling constructors without new
  * indexOf/lastIndexOf with non-Number first argument
  * ByteString.join
  * transcoding
  * ByteArray resizing + modifying
  * copy(), split(), fill(), concat()
  * pop(), push(), shift(), unshift()
  * extendLeft(), extendRight(), reverse(), splice(), displace()
  * Array 1.6 methods
